lines.text: If you give up now I promise to turn you into something useful, like a toaster or a washing machine.

[after blowing up Krillin]
Pop goes the weasel!
So, hot - shot, you want to fight Majin Buu?
Fight you? No, I want to destroy you.
No! My only target is Kakarot! I couldn't care less about your quarrel with the Kai!
What? By every fiber in your body I command you Vegeta! Kill the Kai!

[after killing Android 19]
Too Bad! I only wish that there was a junkyard, so could give him a proper burial.
